modName: Realistic HD Retextured Cross-bow With 2 True Colours
summary: Basically i Hated the texture of the dawn guard crossbow....... DAWNGUARD REQUIRED Just look AT pics For Quality :D
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!!!! Basic Mod But Effective 

!!NEW LIGHT BROWN RE-PLACER!!   3 times Normal size textures                                                                    

Dwarven Coming soon :D CHECK IT OUT NW  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22911

When man Asked for a Cross-Bow . He asked For a High Quality Work of Art but instead he got Stuck with a Quite Unexpected Looking Weapon.....This is Where this mod Comes In :)

Basically i Hated the texture of the dawn guard crossbow and decided it need a texture upgrade. so i took it upon my self to double the texture size and give it a true HD texture that Fits it Perfectly imo!!!  to me i think it looks more realistic and They Look Like True Colours of a CrossBow and Has a Kinda Polished look to it 


!Replaces the steel Crossbow texture ( with Awesomeness)!!!!!



Hope u guys like it and expect more HD textures for DawnGuard Items And please leave a comment :)

ANY requests PM me  :) enjoy

!To Install just use NMM 

Endorse if u like :) will make variants 2
author: GameNinjaPro
